794710.name: 挙式VR 鴻上大和 編 Wedding VR : Yamato
794710.description:
[5/30] Notice of Suspension of "Wedding VR ~ Yamato" [Important].

Thank you very much for using "Wedding VR ~ Yamato".

Today, we have an important notice for you.

We regret to inform you that we will be suspending distribution of this application on June 30, 2023 (Fri.) at 14:00(JST).

We sincerely apologize to all the customers who have been enjoying this application so far.

All of us at Voltage will continue to strive to create content that will be loved by our customers.
We hope you will continue to enjoy our services.


(1) Schedule

The following is the schedule for "Wedding VR - Yamato" before its distribution is suspended.

May 30, 2023 (Tue) 14:00(JST) This notice will be posted.
June 30, 2023 (Fri.) 14:00(JST) Unsubscribe



All of us involved would like to express our gratitude. Thank you again from the bottom of our hearts.
Thank you very much.

We hope you will continue to enjoy Voltage's services.

From the management team of "Wedding VR - Yamato"

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The happy-full VR experience comes to Oculus Rift!
This much-talked-about VR experience is now playable in the palm of your hand!

■Feel as if he’s right in front of you!
The groom, Yamato Kougami, is waiting you in the church.
It feels as if you could reach out and touch him... Experience the world of “My forged Wedding” like never before!

■Story
You are in a church wearing a wedding dress.
He has waiting you. He walks toward you. Then he says "Let's start our wedding ceremony".
You'll had a surprise experience with a special scene!!

■Feature - Multi Ending
You choice the answer in the ceremony.
It makes the ending different.

■English/Japanese
He's voice is japanese both of the language mode.
In English mode, the caption of English is displayed.
794710.supported_languages:
英语, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
